name: Camelot
summary: "Camelot is an adventure game which is based loosely on the adventures of Arthur Pendragon who is banished from Camelot with 10 warriors, 50 bags of gold and 10 bags of food. You have to find the seven items that are listed in the programme and re-enter Camelot, eventually being crowned king. There are three skill levels, a map and various graphic displays."
